amendment.description: To insert a provision relating to a VA-Navy sharing of facilities at North Chicago VA Medical Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2176 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2176 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14511-14512; text: CR S14511) To insert a provision relating to a VA-Navy sharing of facilities at North Chicago VA Medical Center.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2176 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2176 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
